tweet:
I'm continuing my tradition of recognizing one remarkable citizen who has contributed to #GA10 but may not always get the appreciation they deserve. 

This month, meet Mr. Kara Pringle, an Army vet from Wadley, who has truly made volunteering a lifestyle→  http://bit.ly/2IVOYtd  pic.twitter.com/aNKrgBCjIQ

For those looking to add man's best friend to their families, @GAFirstLady Marty Kemp will be hosting the second annual Pet Adoption Day at the Governor’s Mansion tomorrow morning. Stop by to visit with or bring home some furry friends. 

Register here: https://gov.georgia.gov/events/2019-05-17/pet-adoption-day-georgia-governors-mansion …

The good doctor from Maryland, @RepAndyHarrisMD, takes a deep dive into lowering healthcare costs on the latest @freedomcaucus podcast. We discuss price transparency in the healthcare system and highlight efforts to end surprise medical billing.

LISTEN:  https://soundcloud.com/user-671880160/lowering-healthcare-costs-congressman-andy-harris-discusses-price-transparency-and-surprise-billing … pic.twitter.com/temVopxdCy

Is it really too much to ask how many citizens are in our country?

Every census until 1950 asked about citizenship. Frustrating to see that the Democrats’ misinformation campaign has stalled #SCOTUS. https://twitter.com/Jim_Jordan/status/1144268041016025089 …

The Democrats have one agenda: Take down @POTUS @realDonaldTrump. 

Yesterday’s #KellyanneConway hearing orchestrated by @OversightDems shows the lengths @HouseDemocrats will take to undermine the president. @KellyannePolls is good at her job, and Democrats can't stand it. pic.twitter.com/d8RAJFVUY3

Honored to have @PublicHealthUGA professor Dr. Cham Dallas in town to testify before the @GOPoversight National Security Subcommittee. As the director of @universityofga's Institute for Disaster Management, I appreciated hearing his expertise on biodefense preparedness. #GoDawgs pic.twitter.com/7WRdB0lMDj

TONIGHT: As we work to improve care for our veterans, I encourage #GA10 to attend a town hall to discuss the VA Mission Act at @GMCstory's Milledgeville campus. Led by @VADublin Director David Whitmer, folks will learn about the new system to bolster the Veterans Choice Program. pic.twitter.com/t465kD3oh9

Congress is looking quite artsy! Great having this year’s Congressional Art Competition winner in DC. @MonroeArea's own Hayoung Lee & her pencil sketch, "Mom," beat out dozens of other pieces from #GA10, & I look forward to seeing her artwork on my way to votes for the next year. pic.twitter.com/BCpPqOoJZb

And the witch hunt continues...

Despite numerous Hatch Act violations from members of the Obama Administration, @OversightDems are consumed with taking down @POTUS @realDonaldTrump. Subpoenaing #KellyanneConway is yet another Democrat play to undermine this administration. https://twitter.com/GOPoversight/status/1143898450842542080 …

The need for humanitarian assistance along the border is absolutely needed. Unfortunately, with #HR3401, @HouseDemocrats once again ignore the full impacts of illegal migrants engulfing our country. Any solution must examine the real problems to address the national emergency. https://twitter.com/Jim_Jordan/status/1143701861368770561 …

House Democrats blocked yet another attempt to help fix the national emergency at the border. This time, they stopped a motion to hire new judges and personnel to work through the record-breaking immigration backlog that is being exacerbated by the current crisis. https://twitter.com/RepDougCollins/status/1143597907393863680 …

Cutler Shiver is a shining example of setting goals, honoring commitments, and practicing civic duty. Earning @theaward is not easy, but he demonstrated great determination and sincerity throughout his journey. Congrats on this well-deserved honor.

More:  https://hice.house.gov/news/documentsingle.aspx?DocumentID=4963 … pic.twitter.com/7I3g3jDs4p

We all fly, and we all want to be safe in the air. Shouldn't that same desire for safety and security extend to our borders? 

Once again, @OversightDems are talking out of both sides of their mouths when it comes to the staggering national crisis at our southern border. pic.twitter.com/l1OGgyNlsr

Cyber is emerging as a critical domain in today’s world & @FGPAO is on the forefront of responding to that frontier. With the inclusion of the @RepRickAllen-Hice amendment, I'm pleased we secured critical funding for the second phase of the @USArmy's Cyber Instructional Facility. pic.twitter.com/7Hn6nBUxAP

The scourge of abortion has plagued our Nation for too many years, but these policies are not who we are. In the latest episode of the @freedomcaucus podcast, @RepRussFulcher discusses the ongoing battles to protect life – born and unborn. 

LISTEN:  https://soundcloud.com/user-671880160/the-core-of-our-value-system-rep-russ-fulcher-promotes-life-at-all-stages … pic.twitter.com/5SUNs1nyMr

Disappointed that so many of my colleagues voted against reining in our out-of-control federal spending. Just like our constituents back home are required to make tough choices when it comes to planning their own household budgets, we need to do the same right here in Congress. pic.twitter.com/2W4rCuq11i

“Jody Hice: @POTUS @realDonaldTrump and the @FreedomCaucus continue to fight for the millions of forgotten men and women in Washington, DC.” https://www.breitbart.com/politics/2019/06/19/exclusive-jody-hice-trump-freedom-caucus-fighting-for-millions-of-forgotten-men-in-washington/ …

More great news coming to #GA10! With @Wayfair's commitment to bringing 500 new jobs to Athens-Clarke County, Georgia's business community keeps on thriving. Thanks to the hard work of @GovKemp, we're proud to welcome a world-class company to the Peach State. https://twitter.com/GovKemp/status/1141445128634142721 …

The more we learn about the illegal migrants inundating our southern border, the more pressing it becomes to take action. No one is well served by this national emergency, and the security threats posed by criminal aliens is that much more damaging. https://republicans-oversight.house.gov/release/new-data-from-cbp-and-ice-show-hundreds-of-migrants-at-southern-border-have-criminal-records/ …

Huge win for religious liberty today. With #SCOTUS's ruling, the Bladensburg Memorial Cross, a monument dedicated to those who gave their last full measure in WWI, will remain on public land. Honored to cosign an amicus brief led by @SteveScalise in support of its preservation. https://twitter.com/kevincorke/status/1141710976909271041 …

The “manufactured” crisis on the border – exacerbated by months of inaction by @SpeakerPelosi – finally seems worthy of Democrats’ attention. It took the @freedomcaucus using all the procedures at our disposal, but it appears Democrats  are FINALLY willing to take up legislation. https://twitter.com/RepChipRoy/status/1141448936823169027 …

Since Democrats weren't satisfied with the outcome of the Mueller investigation, they’ve changed their play. Instead of dealing with the growing border crisis, they’re raking current & former Trump officials over the coals to see what burns the most. Yet another political stunt. https://twitter.com/realDonaldTrump/status/1141432472602927108 …

.@AOC’s claims are more than just shameful. They reveal her utter ignorance of history, not to mention total lack of understanding of the crisis at our border. @SpeakerPelosi’s refusal to condemn the comments of her own Caucus shows how complicit she is in such radical extremism. https://twitter.com/RealSaavedra/status/1141370293451198464 …

It's simple. @RepChipRoy, @Jim_Jordan, @RepAndyBiggsAZ, @RepAndyHarrisMD, @RepCloudTX, @RepBenCline, @RepRalphNorman, and I are urging @SpeakerPelosi & @HouseDemocrats to do their jobs and address the dire situation at the southern border. There's no time to waste. #DoWhatWeSaid https://twitter.com/thehill/status/1141138524428632065 …

Illegal migrants are entering in droves. To lawmakers who say there isn't an emergency, it's time to open your eyes and come to the table. We're calling on the majority party to bring @realDonaldTrump's border supplemental to the floor for a vote.

WATCH: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-V-XWf8PFl0&feature=youtu.be …

We're holding a press conference today at 3:00 p.m. to address the humanitarian crisis on our border. Feel free to come by! https://roy.house.gov/media/press-releases/9-house-republicans-announce-press-conference-618-requesting-vote-president …

If @AOC really thinks the situation along the southern border is that dire, I encourage her to join me, @RepChipRoy, @Jim_Jordan, @RepAndyBiggsAZ, & others in urging @SpeakerPelosi to put @realDonaldTrump's border supplemental on the floor for a vote to feed and shelter migrants. https://twitter.com/RealSaavedra/status/1140846386042171392 …

This is Edgehill. While the town is truly the smallest in Georgia – with just 24 residents – it may very well be the biggest in heart. On Friday, I was humbled to join the community for the dedication ceremony of its new flagpole outside city hall. More→  http://bit.ly/2KoueMC . pic.twitter.com/uJciFMTx7E
Father’s Day may be over, but Grandfather’s Day is every day with these kiddos. pic.twitter.com/hYM2SQabT1

📍 - @TradeWindCoffee – 2300 Liam Ave #200, Dacula, GA 30019
⏰ - 11:00 am - 1:00 pm

📍 - Wadley City Hall – 37 Butts Street, Wadley, GA, 30477
⏰ - 11:00 am - 1:00 pm

Starting tomorrow, June 15th, the @DeptofDefense, CSRA Regional Commission, and local health departments will hold free health clinics at various locations throughout #GA10. These events will provide local residents with medical, dental, and optometry services. More info ⤵️ pic.twitter.com/xg9BhLL5Ya

Honoring 244 years of service by the @USArmy. We, as a Nation, remain forever grateful to the brave men and women who have courageously fought to defend our freedom and keep Americans across the world safe. #ArmyBDay https://twitter.com/USArmy/status/1139487649008242688 …

"I pledge allegiance to the Flag of the United States of America, and to the Republic for which it stands, one Nation under God, indivisible, with liberty and justice for all."
 
Our Flag serves as an emblem of unity and a symbol of pride for our great country. Happy #FlagDay! pic.twitter.com/0ep4Z8eZc4

Week after week, the crisis at the border grows in size and scope, and week after week @HouseDemocrats refuse to act. Enough is enough. 

If @SpeakerPelosi wants to continue to waste Floor time, then conservatives will use every tactic in our arsenal to force them to get serious. pic.twitter.com/AFnkgYEu4g

In part two of the special @freedomcaucus podcast from the southern border, experts on the front lines help me break down the magnitude of this crisis – from our overwhelmed border patrol agents to the appalling lack of resources they have.

Listen here:  https://soundcloud.com/user-671880160/insider-the-border-crisis-part-two-experts-breakdown-the-national-and-humanitarian-crisis … pic.twitter.com/e997Htmmoq

As one who just returned from the border and having personally seen the enormity of the crisis there, I ask unanimous consent to call up H.R. 3056, an emergency supplemental to provide critically needed funding for the humanitarian crisis at the border. pic.twitter.com/BbBl01moYK

.@HouseDemocrats are fighting tooth-and-nail to preempt the Supreme Court's decision on the 2020 Census citizenship question. Why don’t the @OversightDems want us to know how many citizens – and non-citizens – are in the U.S.?

That’s information we ought to know. @GOPOversight pic.twitter.com/ocnSZJVrcU

REGISTER NOW: At 6:00pm tonight, I’ll be hosting a live, open-topic telephone town hall. If there’s an issue you want me to address, I encourage folks to reply to this post. #GA10 resident may also join the conference by dialing in.

Additional info here:  https://hice.house.gov/forms/form/?ID=34 … pic.twitter.com/JPCAXXrB8Q – at Cannon House Office Building

Through its efforts to enhance sustainability on campus and in the #GA10 community, I congratulate @GeorgiaCollege on its recent recognition as a Green Ribbon School by the Department of @ENERGY.

You shore are my favorite person. Thanking my beautiful wife, Dee Dee, for a wonderful 36 years of love and faith. I love you, sweetheart. pic.twitter.com/YOmSveB3rX

It took far too long, but I’m glad Georgia farmers are finally getting meaningful assistance with the passage of today's disaster relief bill. Hurricane Michael devastated rural and agriculture communities, and I thank my colleagues for voting to help them get back on their feet.
